page.title: 08GALA DAY IN FOUR MARKS CONTD
page.content: Gala Day (cont'd): In the top class of Four Marks School the girls are asked to volunteer if they would like to be a Gala Princess. This year the Gala Princesses were Karen Ullman and Kelly Jones. The Gala Queen is judged from older girls in the village at a disco in the Village Hall. Karen Bailey was chosen this year. Now I shall describe my Gala Day in 1985. It was pouring with rain when I woke up. I am a Guide and we put in a float every year. When I went to decorate the float at 9 a.m. it had stopped raining for a while. We had to go back at 11.30 to change into our costumes for the float which was "Guides through the Ages". I was a guide from 1930. We ate our lunch on the float whilst waiting to be judged. We didn't win a cup this year.
